text: haey( chaur changcha) nowpel del a l laoh ban sanyea chea muoy puok anak( mou slei m aoy mean chychomneah) leu krom muoy nei krom teang pir(kangtp ryy krom satv audth doektomninh) tha pitabrakd nasa vea ku samreab puok anak . haey puok anak chngban krom del kmean avouth(krom satv audth doektomninh) chea robsa puok anak . haey a l laoh chng pongrung karpit( sasanea ai sla m) tamory peakyapech robsa trong haey trong nung katphdach rysakl puok kmean chomnue( u. now samorphoumi ba teur)
